# Project general coding conventions
- Single Responsibility Principle: Each module/class/function should have one responsibility.
- Use SOLID principles for OOP design.
- Keep It Simple. Avoid over-engineering.
- Don't Repeat Yourself. Reuse code via functions, classes, modules
- Avoid breaking changes in public APIs. Use deprecation warnings.
- Never log or store sensitive data (passwords, personal info, secrets).
